name: Contramotion
description:
!!!PLAY IN FULL SCREEN!!!

Winner of the BAFTA YGD 2020 game making award.

Contramotion is a platform game based around mirror imaging and bad puns. Survive 20+ increasingly difficult levels and enjoy 8 original soundtracks.

Download is available here

Contramotion is now back under development using feedback from leading games companies to improve, develop and expand on the initial winning entry. So stay tuned :)
